segments.pli: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci supaṇṇānaṃ rukkhā, kūṭasimbalī tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
segments.en: “Mendicants, of all the trees belonging to the phoenixes, the red silk-cotton tree is said to be the best.

segments.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—bodhāya.
segments.en: In the same way, the faculty of wisdom is said to be the best of the qualities that lead to awakening in terms of becoming awakened.
And what are the qualities that lead to awakening?

segments.pli: Saddhindriyaṃ, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati … pe … paññindriyaṃ bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati.
segments.en: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom are qualities that lead to awakening, in that they lead to becoming awakened.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci supaṇṇānaṃ rukkhā, kūṭasimbalī tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
segments.en: Of all the trees belonging to the phoenixes, the red silk-cotton tree is said to be the best.

segments.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiyā dhammā, paññindriyaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—bodhāyā”ti.
segments.en: In the same way, the faculty of wisdom is said to be the best of the qualities that lead to awakening in terms of becoming awakened.”
